column4: BRIEF-Lannett Anticipates Biosimilar Application For Insulin Glargine To Be Submitted By 2022 End
column6: * LANNETT PROVIDES UPDATE ON CLINICAL ADVANCEMENT OF BIOSIMILAR INSULIN GLARGINE, FOLLOWING FDA MEETING
column7: * LANNETT COMPANY INC - ANTICIPATES BIOSIMILAR APPLICATION FOR INSULIN GLARGINE TO BE SUBMITTED BY END OF CALENDAR YEAR 2022
column8: * LANNETT - FDA PROVIDED POSITIVE FEEDBACK ON CLINICAL AND CMC ADVANCEMENT OF BIOSIMILAR INSULIN GLARGINE THAT WAS CONSISTENT WITH CO’S EXPECTATIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
